verses.text_plain: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
verses.verse_html: 1Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.

verses.text_plain: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;
verses.verse_html: 2Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;

verses.text_plain: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
verses.verse_html: 3Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:

verses.text_plain: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
verses.verse_html: 4That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

verses.text_plain: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
verses.verse_html: 5Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.

verses.text_plain: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
verses.verse_html: 6Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

verses.text_plain: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:
verses.verse_html: 7All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:

verses.text_plain: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;
verses.verse_html: 8Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;

verses.text_plain: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.
verses.verse_html: 9With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.

verses.text_plain: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister’s son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)
verses.verse_html: 10Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister’s son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)

verses.text_plain: And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.
verses.verse_html: 11And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.

verses.text_plain: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
verses.verse_html: 12Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.

verses.text_plain: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.
verses.verse_html: 13For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.

verses.text_plain: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.
verses.verse_html: 14Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.

verses.text_plain: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.
verses.verse_html: 15Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.

verses.text_plain: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
verses.verse_html: 16And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.

verses.text_plain: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
verses.verse_html: 17And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.

verses.text_plain: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen. Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
verses.verse_html: 18The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen. Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
